dcterms:description: A Tamil code-mixed dataset of comments and posts collected from YouTube, containing multiple types of offensive content categorized into six classes: Not-Offensive, Offensive-Targeted-Insult-Individual, Offensive-Targeted-Insult-Group, Offensive-Targeted-Insult-Other, Offensive-Untargeted, and Not-Tamil.
dcterms:title: Tamil code-mixed dataset of comments and posts from YouTube

dcterms:description: A dataset for processing South Asian languages written in the Latin script, aimed at facilitating various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Dakshina dataset
